member.summary: Compares two serialization member info objecst.
member.param: The first object to compare.
The second object to compare.
member.returns:
A signed integer that indicates the relative values of and , as shown in the following table. Value Meaning
Less than zero is less than .
Zero equals .
Greater than zero is greater than .

member.summary: Gets the empty instance (with empty name).

member.name: M:Qhta.Xml.Reflection.QualifiedName.CompareTo(Qhta.Xml.Reflection.QualifiedName)
member.summary: Compares namespace first, then name.
member.param: An object to compare with this instance.
member.returns:
A value that indicates the relative order of the objects being compared. The return value has these meanings: Value Meaning
Less than zero This instance precedes in the sort order.
Zero This instance occurs in the same position in the sort order as .
Greater than zero This instance follows in the sort order.
